briefTitle: Double-Blind Efficacy and Safety of CD5789 (Trifarotene) 50µg/g Cream Versus Vehicle Cream in Acne Vulgaris
officialTitle: A Multi-Center, Randomized, Double-Blind, Parallel-Group Vehicle Controlled Study To Compare The Efficacy And Safety Of CD5789 (Trifarotene) 50µg/g Cream Versus Vehicle Cream In Subjects With Acne Vulgaris
summary: Assessment of the efficacy and safety of CD5789 (Trifarotene) 50µg/g cream applied once daily for 12 weeks in subjects with acne vulgaris.

primaryOutcome.measure: Investigator Global Assessment (IGA) Score of 1 (Almost Clear) or 0 (Clear)
